reviews.review:
7 из 10,посоны
Любители РПГ-покупайте, игра неплохая

Представьте. 2009 год. Я поменялась дисками с подругой. Она мне дала именно этот диск. 
Через какое-то время я решила запустить его.
Эта игра поразила меня прям до глубины души. В ней было все ИДДЕАЛЬНО: атмосфера,музыка,диалоги,история,персонажи.
Мы частенько зависали после школы у меня. С этой игрой у меня связано то беззаботное время))
Но потом я переехала, диск отдала опять подруге

И ВОТ,ДАМЫ И ГОСПОДА, ЧЕРЕЗ 5 ЛЕТ Я КУПИЛА ЕЕ!

Серьезно так поебавшись с анкетой, я начала играть
Графон... Графон не самое важное, но тут он неплох (для того времени)
Жаль, у меня диалоги были на английском, хоть я и хорошо знаю английский-играть было сложнее
Но вообще, впечатления от игры прекрасные, ностальгия, все дела
Lo amoooo

as you can see i have been playing for 24 hours.. and now suddenly i cant play it anymore.. yes i already did a game integrity check and yes i reboted my computer.. but how is this possible.. it has also happened with some other games..

Why can't my horse keep a straight line? Why won't it turn where I want to go? Why can't I cast a spell on a moving horse? How do the skill shortcuts work? Why can't I reassign them? Why only 3 spells at a time? Why this botched and weird alchemy system? Why did I keep playing? So many questions, a couple of laughs, and a good amount of frustration later I did actually finish this game, in a most shameful binge. That's one thing this game has over Skyrim/Oblivion I suppose... I bothered to finish it. Towards the end I skipped most quests and hated the ones I had to do and I am very glad I am finished with this game.

Once you figure it out (and you will have to, and make allowances for bugs and glitchiness, etc), this game opens up and is pleasant enough to play despite the annoyingly slow animations, dumb plot and characters, general uninspiredness, useless and bugged and bizarre skills, and general laughability. It reminds me a lot of Dungeon Siege if it was mixed with Morrowind and made in eastern Europe, which I guess is why it spoke to me more than Skyrim/Oblivion did. Permanent +stat potions make alchemy necessary and briefly interesting as you seek new ingredients and wonder how/if they'll work. If this game had been allowed to gestate another 6 to 8 months it would've been pretty good, possibly better than the games it was competing with. As it stands, it's a large mostly empty world filled with nothing but annoying chained fetchquests, and it will give you the sense it's a rush job. 

The little teleport stones (as in Divine Divinity) are brilliant and make up for some of the annoyances of travel - more games need that or at least Mark/Recall ability. Swimming is ridiculously bad and that they made it skillbased was a really bad choice - there are some major design issues with this game. It only crashed once when I played it, and there were no game-breaking bugs, but some of the quests are a little wonky. There is almost no replay value here, but on sale it should cost less than 2 bucks, which is roughly a fair price for the enjoyment you should be able to eke out of it. I don't think I'll return for Game 2, but I had my fun and laughed pretty hard at some of the oddities of this game. +1 for Taint Shoots. 

(If you really want to have a laugh after you finish this, check out youtube user 'ProJared's' review, in which he, the babylike pro, admits to having problems playing an incredibly simple and generally unchallenging game and cheating to defeat it because it's unfair. This game was many things as well as being poorly designed, but only blatantly unfair at the very end.)

El juego esta buggueado hubo una mision que en realidad no pude terminar (debido al bug)
Tiene problemas para jugarlo pues necesitas una configuracion especial *La cual les dare un metodo para conseguirla al final de la reseña*
El final se corta no importa que haga (a mi y a unos cuantos les pasa) *no pude arreglarlo pero puedes ver los videos en tu carpeta de instalacion*
La IA es muy predecible despues de un  combate
El personaje se vuelve totalemnte poderoso haciendo que el jeugo (si es que jugaste un par de misiones secundarias) sea muy sencillo realmente SENCILLO

Sin embargo...
El juego es bueno es entretenido y a pesar de que tiene bugs hasta en las animaciones logro capturarme
Tiene un buen soundtrack
Los graficos si no son perfectos son buenos
Tiene una pequeña seccion de mods que vale la pena ver
La historia es relativamente entretenida y las submisiones tambien

En resumen el juego puede ser un desastre ya que algunas veces me derrotaban por un par de bugs del juego
Pero si estas interesado en un juego semilinear de "mundo abierto" con estilo RPG este es un buen titulo y TE LO RECOMIENDO

Si buscas perfeccion total NO TE RECOMIENDO ESTE JUEGO

Tambien si esta reseña logra tener una puntuacion larga aclarare algunas dudas del juego o bugs y como arreglarlos 

Aca les dejo la SOLUCION GENERAL DE PROBLEMAS COMUNES:

Descarga "Two worlds control panel" para esto necesitas ir a la pagina de www.insidetwoworlds.com pero simplemente googlea "Two worlds control panel" y en el primer resultado te saldra
Una vez configurado ve a donde dice "Tweaks" y de ahi "disable intros" algunos tienen problemas al iniciar por esto

De ahi si tienes problemas con lag grafico ve a la sub-pestaña de "tweaks"
"Graphics">"Disable High quality shadows" eso te ayudara en gran parte a solucionar el lag grafico
abajo de esta opcion ajusta tu resolucion a la del monitor o pantalla que uses y dale en "Set" es de suma importancia
Y te vas a la ultima pestaña que dice "launch game"

Aca esta la segunda solucional lag grafico aunque tambien puede que tengas lag por el problema que se soluciona anteriormente
Una vez seleccionada la opcion "Launch game"
Selecciona la segunda pestaña llamada "Advanced" y de ahi selecciona la prioridad que desees *Vease las especificaciones de tu maquina si lo requiere o no

Y lo mas importante abajo las opciones que determinan el como se comporta el juego (en cuanto a desempeño) dependiendo de tu equipo seleccionas la que te convenga pero la solucion que a mi y a varios les funciono es:

High Priority

Use Tick Count

Launch w/Exit

Espero esto les funcione si no manden un mensaje a mi perfil
das spiel hab ich gekauft geht nicht da kommt immer fehler oder fuktioniert nicht brauch hilfe.....

Sadly, I cannot say this game was good. It has a lot of good going for it, and at one time during development it may have even been a great game, but it simply has too many bugs, is too glitchy, and has really weird commentary by the characters like saying "What do we have here?" every goddamn time you pick a plant. It gets annoying as fast as the small enemy target areas which seem impossible to hit sometimes so it's a lot of button mashing. I bought it on the sale for $1.50 and that was all that made it worth it. Great graphics for its age, and it has some good ideas, but stay as far away from it as possible. Once you're in, you'll be mad at it for life. Oh, did I mention the half hour it takes for the initial start-up of the game, plus giving all your personal information to the developers so they can "keep you up to date with the latest content"? Yea, major no no.
zajebiste polskie rpg ;o

Oyun hakkında ne tür bir beklentiniz olduğunu bilemem fakat eğer ki almaya niyetiniz varsa fazla beklemeyin derim.Akıcı ve basit oynanışı gayet anlaşılabilir sistemi ile sizi saatlerce pc başına bağlayabilir.Benim fazla bir beklentim yoktu ama oyunu oynamaya başladıktan sonra bağımlısı oldum diyebilirim ve 2. oyunuda satın aldım sırf ilk oyunu bitirdiğim ve dahasını istediğim için.Başarılı bir rpg multiplayer olarak pvp falan yapılıyor sanırım hiç denemedim o özelliğini ama dediğim gibi başarılı bir oyun bunu ve 2. oyunu edinmeye çalışın pişman olmayacaksınız.

Поиграв 1 час я сделал для себя много выводов.Первый из них это то что не русификации даже текста,я не говорю уж об озвучке.Второй вывод я считаю что в игре навязчивые враги и примитивная система боя, и третий вывод не очень понятный сюжет и нас сразу же через 5 минут игры без толкового обучения бросают в бою с какими то существами похожими на внебрачных отродий орков и гоблинов даже не объсняя как с ними бороться.Мой совет если вы любитель RPG не покупайте эту игру она может испортить впечатление о данном жанре,если же вы так будете гореть желанием приобрести эту игру делайте это только на распродаже или во время скидки на эту игру.
Best $1.50 i've spent in my life. If this game goes on sale again buy like 20 copies and give them to your friends and spread the rpg madness. 10/10
I hear this game is actually good once you fight through the terrible framerate issues and crashes. However, the game crashes before I can even do anything...

I've been playing Two Worlds for the better part of 40 hours and I am loving it!  It's not Skyrim, DragonAge, or The Witcher, but I'm finding it to be a deeply interesting and fun RPG to play.  It has a well developed world full of warring factions, magic, skills, and horse back riding.  I actually like the horse back riding better in Two Worlds than in Skyrim (IMHO).  The questing in my mind is what is the most fun in this game.  Two Worlds is loaded with cities, caves, dungeons, and quests to complete.  This is not an expensive game and I've seen it goes as low as 1.49.  This game has issues and some very quirky dialogue, but I still recommend it.  I could have finished the main quest 15 hours ago, but I'm having too much fun with the side quests.  I've seen a lot of bad reviews for this game and I can understand some of the complaints, but I find this game so much fun and the quirks and bugs just simply don't bother me.  "Lovely weather" said the hero as he stormed through the rain shower that just popped up.  Love It!
no lo recomiendo sinceramente es basura, tanto graficamente como a la hora de jugar. No os gasteis ni un duro en esto

Just my few cents about the game:
People can say what they want about this game. For me its a classic action sandboxed rpg with loads of things to explore and  combat mechanics is easy to understand. I wont say its easy to master but fun when you do. I have loads of hours into this game on x360 so for me it was instant buy on steam sale.
ребят что делать нажимаю новая игры и он чёто птшет на англиском в игре и опять переводит в меню?

Not the greatest game, but a damn fine buy at $1.49.

I bought this & like many before me, immediately experienced crashing. after checking the forum I quickly found a link to a legacy driver that fixed the issue. I had issues getting my gamepad to work with the game, but conquered that battle. And even after getting the gamepad to work, the game (especially the combat) handles like a monster truck with no power steering. Now don't get me wrong even after all the issues above & the occasional crash (after 20+ I experienced: 1 during gameplay & 1 lock up during exiting the game) this game is pretty friggen good.

Combat is a bit clunky. I wish it was as polished as Amalur's, but I wasn't expecting a whole hell of a lot coming into this one. The best I can say for combat is it's passable.

Storyline is above average. Not too cliche.

Graphics are not horrible for a 2009 release.

Audio is pretty damn good. I found my self impressed with the wildlife sounds Top Ware bothered to add.

Two Worlds WILL fight with you. Knowing that, would I recommend it at full price? Probably not, there are better games out there more deserving of the $9.99. I would say grab this fast, if it's on sale & you enjoy 3rd person, open world RPGs..... Oh & if you have the patience.
At the $1.49 I paid it is worth a try some interesting concepts muddled in a mass of bugs and broken game mechanics.However at full price it is not worth the asking price of 10 bucks.
this game wont even start up on my x775 locks the whole pc up its bs !!!! its trash dont waste your money!!!!

Un jeu méconnu tant à sa sorti il a eu de patch. Pour l'avoir fini deux fois, je peux vous dire qu'il est ultra addictif. Parmis les faiblesses on notera des graphismes datés et en même temps beau ( notamment les armures , armes ) , voix fr pas terrible , animations moyennes et histoire sans grand interet.
En contrepartie, des loots tous utiles puisque 2 même objets peuvent fusionner et ameliorer ses caracteristiques, une evolution de perso simple on peut être mage, guerrier les deux à la fois, jouer avec l'arme qu'on veut nimporte quand. Le system de respawn quand on meurt est genial et une durée de vie énorme. Je passe sur l'alchimie très poussé ainsi que des villes denses pleines de quêtes standart.
Je recommande vraiment ce jeu et pour 1 euros  50 je me suis pêrmis de me le racheter sur steam pour le finir une troisième fois !

Well the game is one of those games you really hate even if you really try not to. 
The first time I tried it was at launch on a 360 that means that I had to load every few steps so I remembered a much longer game that what I saw this time (My computer doesn't load ever few steps, it is actually quite smooth)

Short version
Is this game really cheap right now? I mean dirt cheap, steam sale cheap $2
Do you have a free wekend ahead and nothing else to do?
Do you want dual cleavers called "run dodo run"?
Want to relive 2007?
 if you answered yes to any go ahead get it, if not well you are going to keep wondering how bad could it be.
The good
Well you can get Katanas
Fuckloads of armors and weapons (Seriously MMO ammounts of them)
Crafting, enchanting and the likes - those may be the norm now but they were something new back then.

The bad
Quests are bad
Quests are broken
Like 4 kind of enemies
Repetitive
Any combat other than magic and melee
Voice acting

The so bad it is good
Voice acting
You are way too overpowered in combat untouchable if you learn how to dodge right. That means you can finish the game at level two if you dodge and attack (May take a while to do enough damage though)
If you get mad at a quest just kill everyone in town you will fail the quest but you get to level up, loot their corpses finding anything you needed.

This game has lots of visible potential that I really like about it, but it does not come without flaws. 
The environments look really good, especially for the time this game was made, and the music is pretty good as well. The story is a joke though; it doesn't make much sense at all, and things just kind of happen.
The gameplay is simple enough to get used to, and you'll probably find yourself invested in it at some point. There's a cool sense of progression because of your ability to constantly find good weapons and armor not just from the stores, but as enemy drops and treasure. 
The voice acting and animations in general are really bad, but this becomes VERY entertaining.
Overall, it feels like a somewhat hackneyed cash-in on the things that the Elder Scrolls series was pulling that didn't quite work out for Reality Pump, especially due to the amount of hype it had generated prior to its release. But all of that is past, and we can now appreciate it for what it is, rather than what it should have been. And for what this game does well, I believe it deserves a second look. Don't know if I would pay the standard $10 for it, but if you can get it for a good price, you might be surprised.

Open World RPG. The takes about 15 hours for the main quest; probably 5-10hrsr more on all the side quests. There are multiple ways to complete quests and you can kill anyone at any time. It is Skyrim of 10 years ago. The voice acting and the word usage is the only downfall. The storyline is a little wierd too. However, it is fun questing and the packs of monsters are unforgiving. It can be a challenge. I took a lot of 1 hit kill deaths.

Ehhhh. I can't recommend this one. Sure games that have the mobs leveling up with you, still at least try to make things fun and enjoyable, while making you feel like you are getting stronger. This game doesn't do that. The stronger you get, the stronger the enemies get, and its a never ending balance that cannot be broken. It becomes boring rather fast, as leveling in this Epic edition, is Epicly slow. Expect every fight to be a hard one.
Отличная игра,можно здорово провести время.Интерес к ней не пропадает,но она на любителей,мир свободный,ходи где хош,убивай все,что движется,естественно по желанию!

Вот решил написать нормальный обзор на фантастическую игру Two World.

Тут есть в прямом смысле свободный мир,а именно что вас никто не заставляет выполнять квесты.Можете уйти гулять сразу как выйдете из Храма.Система авторитета очень радует, нужно думать,что вы делаете и как это повлияет на ваш авторитет с другими группировками.Довольно забаную штуку с обьединением итемов придумали разработчики,если подогнать два одинаковых оружия или брони,то можете получить на голову выше итем.Боевая система проста и приятна,с прокаченным оружием враги будут разлетаться во все стороны и это будет дико доставлять.О физике смысла говорить нет(обычная физика).Красивый мир с отличный саундтреком и море интересных квестов ждут вас.Эта игра заставит вас думать и запоминать, так как тут не все квесты отображаются на карте и придеться перечитывать квест и залипать на карте чтобы понять ,что делать.Блин эта игра просто нереальная и всем любителям серии TES,Gothic эта игра обязятельна к преобретению.
Итог:10/10

no. just no

Okay, before looking at the time I have spent sofar on this game for PC, please realize I have it for 360 as well, and beat it with about 200 hours or so and all the achievements. This game is amazing, hands down. While the graphics and voice acting is not the best to todays standards, it is still pretty good. The story line is like a 7/10 for me, but the side quests are very good. NOTHING respawns in this game, so it is possible to kill everything in the game and be stuck with nothing to do. I do love the part of the map where the volcanos are and all that, as it was done very nice. The mobs are fantastic and unique as well, such as the Lava Dragon. It might start out hard in certain areas, but once you get to about level 45 or so, you can pretty much 1 hit everything except the boss and mobs in the hell area. 10/10 game for me. I do not like the second game much though...

Two Worlds Epic Edition is an okay game. I've had both Two Worlds and Two Worlds 2 on the Xbox 360 and have enjoyed it immensely. When I saw it for sale on Steam, I couldn't resist. I will be playing it more in the future.. I just need to get my hands on Two Worlds 2. The game itself is... Well... A little shabby. It's not bad, but not amazing. It leaves you wanting more. The multiplayer is probably the best feature since you can keep everything you earn. (Not the PvP.. The story mode.)
Had to Install older PhysX drivers, MP is dead Cannot change gender on SP and well overall confuseing controls.... Really?

Честно говоря, игра хорошая. Даже очень. Да, безусловно в ней есть минусы, например: скучная техника боя типа "закликай его до смерти"; странная анимация бега ГГ, его всегда немного кренит влево, но при этом он бежит вперед; и конечно же убогое управление лошадью. Но при этом есть и много плюсов: интересная система прокачки; много магических заклинаний, которые к тому же разделены на школы (некромантия, магия огня, воды и т.д.); много брони, разделенной на штаны, ботинки, нагрудник, перчатки и шлем (согласитесь, не во многих играх такое увидишь); большое количество оружия, щитов. Так же в игре есть неплохо проработанная алхимия (везде растут грибы и травка на любой вкус, эксперементируйте); есть в игре и враги, которых кстати немало; тут нашлось место и интересным квестам (в некоторых местах даже с юмором). Ну и подведем итог: Two Worlds хорошая РПГ, по пейзажам и природе мне очень напомнила Gothic 3 и Oblivion, даже на ностальгию пробило. Открытый мир с интересными местами и людьми. При покупке сомневался, так как 2 часть мне не очень понравилась, но первая меня действительно удивила. Рекомендую.
Очень неплохо. Даже в наше время смотрится и играется на ура. Не без недочетов но в итоге 4+, советую.

Two Worlds es un hermoso juego con una compleja trama de intereses de poder.Los juegos de la saga TWorls son más bien para público adulto.Hay numerosas ciudades, poblados y cuevas repartidos por todo el mapa por el que iremos haciendo misiones,apoyando los intereses de una facción u otra según queramos. A pesar de ser gráficamente muy hermoso, de tener un mapa gigante, y docenas de distintas criaturas, se adapta muy bien a la capacidad de nuestro pc. La jugabilidad sin embargo no es la esperada,no porque sea mala,si no porque es rara,no es habitual el despliegue de habilidades del héroe de esta manera como nos la presentan,sin embargo una vez que le coges el truquillo funciona muy bien. Tiene armaduras,armas,y pociones para dar y tomar.Yo lo he dado de alta por Tlfn y por red,y sin problemas. Mi nota es : 8. Es un buen juego,pero lo disfrutarán más jugadores avezados en rol, para novatos se puede hacer un poco dificultoso y es fácil que lo abandonen,por la trama y el manejo.
Como que faz pra ativar este jogo, aqui esta dando que meu codigo de ativação e invalido.
Underrated Game!!

Je vous déconseille particulièrement ce jeu, en premier lieu de par l'attention que les développeur lui porte. 
Ce jeu crashera SYSTEMATIQUEMENT lors de ses démarrages: il faudra installer un driver pour que celui-ci marche, (les dévelopeurs n'ont pas jugé utile de faire une uptdate),
ensuite, une fois le jeu lancé, ceux-ci se permettent de vous bloquer l'accés au jeu tant que vous leurs donnerez pas quelques informations (code postale, nom, prénom [après l'achat je précise] mais il est possible de passer outre)
Ensuite, le jeu lui-même à des graphismes plutôt moche, les combats sont mous et pénible, les bruitages de certaines créatures sont horibles, les visages sont mal fait... 
Vous n'entrerez jamais dans l'histoire avec des tenants et aboutissant aussi vus et revus.
finalement c'est un jeu à déconseiller : testez plutôt la série des gothics dans le même style en plus réussi.
Great game, totally reccomend it

This game is one of the best games, and one of the worst. So many bugs, stupidity, and game graphics - but yet so addicting. Love it!!

Game has problems running with video cards.  Got this one with two world bundle,  it kind works on older, pc's with older video, cards, but not with new video card types, and if u got a AMD Radeon HD 6570 game will not work at all. just a not. when buying older type window, games like this one. check your video card and its settings,  card might play all the new stuff, but when comes to older game. got look  at the settings and the codeing, that your card has.  as for recommending this game, i would say NO, since,  never got it to work.
Great game but don't even bother buying it on here. I had a bad experience trying to get it to work. First it wouldn't launch & then there was no sound. Better to get it for Xbox 360.

I thought this game was going to be somewhat of a generic type of elder scrolls Oblivion. come to find out the game doesnt even run. I would like to see an update or a fix because i honestly wasted 2$ on this, and i regret it. i would not recommend this to a friend nor would i think about buying it again.

O ponto mais forte do game é a ambientação, os cenários são bonitos e as músicas e sons também. Além de contar com um bom sistema de utilização de elementos para criar / aperfeiçoar as armas / magias. 
O uso da armadura e armas também obedece critérios que dão mais realismo ao jogo. Assim como das montarias também. As suas ações influenciam diretamente na sua moral dentro da história. Apesar de tudo, o enredo não é grande coisa. 
O mapa é grande e tem rio, cavernas, castelos, torres, etc. Várias locações com diferenças de clima.
Vale ter cuidado na hora de explorar terrenos, pois o personagem pode ficar preso em alguns lugares (montaria também).
O jogo não é muito pesado e conta com multiplayer (só encontrei um servidor aberto e quase ninguém jogando).

É um jogo que não tem grandes chefes, bem fácil nesse quesito.
Apesar do mapa ser grande, é muito menor do que os de WoW, por exemplo. E o game pode ser zerado em pouco tempo.

Resumindo, um RPG simples pra comprar em promoção.
An unpolished, overambitious, low budget game, that nevertheless is extremely fun if you can get over the lack of polish.

Another open world, filled with magic and mighty armor/weapons. A good new game like Gothic, a lot of fans should try this for the experience. A game filled with choices and moral dilemmas, makes this a unique experience that allows you to immerse yourself into the life of a pirate and work your way through the hierarchy. Deffinetly worth trying if you liked Gothic, Oblivion or Arx Fatalis.

9/10 for all due to some minor tweaks/buggs that should have been corrected or improved upon.

Very poor game. Hardware-wise it stutters on 9 out of 10 machines you play it on. In terms of gameplay. the world is very open, yet you still feel boxed-in. Horse riding is a total pain in the ass, they seem to have their own agenda and don't all-in-all, it doesn't work very well. They bump into invisible walls and take themselves up weird routes. 

Combat feels completely devoid of consideration, you just repeatedly LClick. You're stunlocked while attacking, so attack once more than you want to (which is way too easy to do) and you'll take hefty punishments from the thousands of mobs you pull just walking through the wilderness. It feels way more like an MMO that only you are playing rather than an RPG - there are far too many mob encounters, meaning it takes forever to get anywhere if you're not the kind to just pull a trail of creeps around with you. 

The voice acting is ridiculously bad, and the dialogue is cringeworthy. I've played some bad RPGs, but this one takes the cake. 

I hear the second one's better, though.
Das ist echt EPIC haha Verstanden?
this is a pretty good game, the graphic are pretty bad and the voice acting will make you laugh but overall its not a bad game. if this is onsale i would def recommend picking up a copy.
un jeux que j'aime beaucoup,certains une fois que l'on comprend comment faire on devient trop puissant mais tout nos choix on des consequence.note 4/5

Good game, one of the first Open World I have played. The two main cons I would state are: Tons of bugs, but none actually important, and, just like most open world RPGs, if you do the side quests, the main quest becomes really, really easy because you are too overpowered. Also, the semi-boss is kinda harder than the final boss. (many monsters are actually harder than the final boss (both endings))

Anyway, good balancing IMO, decent stats and skills, and decent story. Enjoyed the time playing and would recommend it.

Back in the day the game was one of the top open world rpg's. Tho the voice acting and animations are really sloppy the overall game is really enjoyable with some nice difficult fight good looking gear and a huge world. Tho if you do not like the choppy gameplay of older games then you will probably not enjoy this either.

TL:DR A fun game if you can get past the sloppy voice acting and animations.

A great game, very underrated. In many respects similar to an Elder Scrolls game with the same freedom of movement, collecting alchemy ingredients, running around doing quests, and the same sense towards the end of the game that you can destroy everything with ease.

Enemies tend to be in either groups of average strength or single or pairs of overwhelming strong enemies. They have to be managed differently, and archery is actually very usefull especialy when facing large number of archers who can disarm you and do decent levels of damage.

The first 30 minutes of the game is a grind but get past that and the game becomes very enjoyable.

One of the really enjoyable things about the game is that the guards of towns are no stronger than they should be. So if you are able to take down a cyclops or slay a dragon you don't get the sillyness of guards being able to bash you up. In fact if you want you can rampage through the world slaying everyone and reserecting people afterwards. It's slightly over the top but it really adds to the enjoyment.
хорошая игра

The GPU Driver issues seem to be gone, and I was able to actually play the game over several days. I bought this game on 360 when it was released, and it was BAD, really bad. It kept me occupied, but I had never gotten far into it. I have now beaten the game, the cut scenes were crap, the voice overs were abysmal as well. The story was simply okay, The game play was actually pretty good, when it was smooth. For something I had bought forever ago, it wasn't bad. I was only able to see the first intro cut scene, and then the game bugged out and I saw none after that, I had to Youtube them, whenever I felt like there had been one. I now have beaten the game, and have 34 Hours in it.

When I try to activate the game (you HAVE to do that to be able to play!), I simply can't. The servers appear to be shut down ("connection failed") and the phone number provided for activation via phone is unknown to my provider or whoever it is telling me "the number you have dialed is unknown". This is a waste of money.

This is one of those games. The ones where you're taking a massive dump and think to yourself "I really feel like playing this game. It's so big and open and just a beautiful adventure." But then as soon as you wipe you realize, "Oh. I just thought it sounded fun because I was taking a crap. When I take a crap, all I think about is crap."

Игра отличная, и не требует железа. играл когда вышла! была кривой, не доделаный порт с ХренБокса! сейчас поправили, и можно играть. НО! http://www.nvidia.ru/object/physx-9.13.0604-legacy-driver-ru.html Ставить обязательно, без него не катит, у многих!

В 2009 комп не потянул её, но наверстал упущенное в 2014. 

[b]Что понравилось?[/b] Открытый мир, приятный графон и весьма не плохая анимация основного персонажа, простая прокачка лвлов, много шмота и пушек, забавные баги с летающими конями.
[b]Не понравилось:[/b] [u]вялый сюжет[/u], карта создает впечатление большой, но на самом деле не большая и пустая. 

Порекомендую игру манчкиным вроде меня. Гриндить шмот и набивать лвл, наструливая всё вокруг с лука мне было интересно. Да и по [strike]лесу[/strike] карте побегать, исследовать пещеры оказалось круто. Правда докачавшись до 40 лвла дропнул игру так её и не пройдя до конца. Но боевка здесь чес слово классная. Рекомендую.
ИГРА ЧЕЛОВЕЧЕСТВА КОТОРУЮ НЕ ПРЕВЗОШЁЛ ЕЩЁ НИКТО И НИКОГДА НЕ СМОЖЕТ ПОТОМУ ШО ЭТО ЕДИНСТВЕННАЯ ТРУ РПГ НЕ ПОХОРОНЁННАЯ ПОД КУЧЕЙ БЕСПОЛЕЗНЫХ ФИЧ

Jako velký fanoušek fantasy RGP, ať už Oblivion, Skyrim nebo Gothic, musím říct že jsem hrou unešen.

Asi největší plus má u mě za vyváženost boje. Takže se nemusíte bát jednoho vlka, protože tam běhají smečky a i ty bez problémů rozprášíte. Dá se bojovat z koňského hřbetu což je proti skupině nepřátel velice efektivní. Přičemž má kůň mnoho rychlostí, od chůze, přez klus, běh až cval (a možná i něco mezi tím)

Další velký plus pro mě, je přehledné vylepšování postavy kdy v jedné přehledné stránce přesně vidím, jak jednotlivé Atributy a skilly vylepšují postavu.

Co mě ještě potěšilo je vyřešení vybavení. Stejné předměty se dají spojovat s lepší a silnější. Dají se obohacovat o bonusy k obraně nebo k útoku. Ale není těch bonusů zase tolik, aby se v tom hráč ztrácel.

Jedna z věcí která mě občas trochu vadí je přesouvání věcí Inventář->Kůň a potom hlavně Kůň->Inventář->Obchodník
I když nosnost postavy je s přiívajícími lvly opravdu dobrá, i přez to je prodávání všeho co najdu stále nejlepším způsobem jak si vydělat peníze.

Questy jsou různorodé, a většina z nich velice ovliňuje vývoj hry (Komu dáte přednost ten je v sedle). Avšak pokud proběhnete rychle hlavním příběhem, tak jsou později některé questy nesplnitelné.

Ale jsem si jistý že fanoušky svého žánru nesklame. Říká se že každá hra má své mouchy, tyhle se ale dají odehnat mečem.

Un mundo con una extension muy muy grande, es dificil ya que siempre estas contra 3 o 4 enemigos, aún así es muy recomendable y or 2 euros que me costo en una promo no puedo pedir mucho más. a ver cuantas horas me dura.

This game overall is good.
I very much enjoy the magic system involving cards and boosters of several types, and when you get more than one card of the same kind you can stck them for added power. Combat is very fun and the difficulty is just right. The voice acting i give a thumbs up. Not because its anyh good... quite the opposite. Its soo bad its good. You will die laughing in some spots. The voice actor for Gandohar is god though.
